What can Police do through V!P ?

 -Police requires a valid police id to get registered and get logged in to use this app for checking vehicle information and taking further legal actions.

-Police can automatically send the vehicle towed location to the vehicle owner.

 Information Retrieval after vehicle search:

● Owner Name

● Contact number

● Address

● Maker Info

● Registration date

● Fuel type

● Vehicle age

● Registration authority

● Engine number

● Chassis number

What can Public do through V!P ?

 -Public requires a valid mobile number to signup or logged in to the VIP app.
 -Public can search and retrieve details of their own vehicles as well as others.
 -Public is also provided a complaint feature in the app where they can issue a complain immediately in case their car has been stolen or robbed.


Information retrieval after vehicle search:

● Owner Name

● Maker Info

● Registration date

● Fuel type

● Vehicle age

● Registration authority
